articles.title: Canada is open to Americans who may lose access to abortions, but there's a catch - POLITICO
articles.description: While the offers from Trudeau's government and providers are sincere, the reality is that access in Canada is complicated and "wait lists are through the roof."
articles.content:
Political reaction in Canada to the draft Supreme Court opinion has been swift, with no shortage of posturing. Americans have always been free to travel to Canada for medical care, for example.
